extension.name: Field: S3 Image Upload
extension.description: S3 Image Uploads, with cropping and resizing functionality.

releases.release: - Add support for Custom Endpoints - Add Region support for S3 image upload field
- Add new field to multi file uploads directly through S3 - not necessarily images
- Make Crop UI optional - Update Cursor icons when cropping - Fix replacing an existing image

- Initial Version - UI showing large preview image and resized images - ability to change the resized images without re-uploading original - cropped images provided via field config are uploaded directly to s3 buckets - uses JIT formatters for uploading
